I tried to add my mobile device to Sync yesterday and tried 3-4 times on my Windows 7 machine, but I kept getting a generic "Please try again." message. After a while I realized what the problem was: I had no internet connection (my wireless adapter was switched off)!

Instead of just saying "Please try again," could we say something about what went wrong? E.g. in this case it would be better to just say "You don't seem to have a Web connection at the moment." or something similar.
comments.author: djst@mozilla.com
